bape.authenticity_notes: Check WGM (World Gone Mad) shark hoodies for symmetrical teeth. Authentic tags have specific fonts and spacing. Gold ape head tags on older pieces.

off_white.authenticity_notes: Check zip tie tag attachment, quotation marks font, and diagonal stripe alignment. Authentic labels have specific spacing.

palace.authenticity_notes: Check Triferg logo symmetry and wash tag fonts. UK-made pieces most desirable.

stussy.authenticity_notes: Check signature script logo quality. Vintage pieces have different tag styles by era.

supreme.authenticity_notes: Box logo stitching should be tight with no loose threads. Check wash tag fonts and spacing. Made in USA/Canada for older pieces.

adidas.notes: Est. 1949, Germany. Trefoil era (pre-1990) most valuable; Made in W. Germany or France labels.
adidas.authenticity_notes: Trefoil logo era most valuable. Made in W Germany or France indicates pre-1990. Check label fonts and country of origin.

arcteryx.authenticity_notes: Check dead bird logo quality. Canadian-made pieces. Authentic zippers have Arc'teryx branding.

carhartt.authenticity_notes: Made in USA labels most valuable. WIP line has different labels. Check stitching quality and label fonts.

champion_reverse_weave.authenticity_notes: Made in USA labels most valuable. Check C logo embroidery quality. Vintage has different label styles.

nike.notes: Est. 1964, USA. Grey/silver/orange tag era (1970s-80s) most valuable.
nike.authenticity_notes: Grey/silver/orange tag eras most valuable. Check swoosh quality. Made in USA labels for vintage.

north_face.authenticity_notes: Check hologram tags on newer pieces. Vintage Gore-tex labels. Made in USA for older pieces.

patagonia.authenticity_notes: Check label fonts and spacing. Made in USA for vintage. Authentic fleece has specific texture.

starter_jackets.authenticity_notes: Check satin quality and embroidery detail. Made in Korea/USA labels. Team licensing tags.

agolde.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware quality. Made in USA.

citizens_of_humanity.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and pocket stitching. Made in USA.

frame.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Made in USA.

j_brand.authenticity_notes: Check interior label fonts and hardware quality.

mother.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Made in USA.

paige.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware quality.

rag_bone.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Made in USA for mainline.

seven_mankind.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and distinctive back pocket stitching pattern.

japanese_selvedge.authenticity_notes: Made in Japan. Check selvedge edge (visible when cuffed). Heavy denim weight. Quality hardware and stitching.

lee.notes: Est. 1889, USA. Union Made era, Storm Rider jackets collectible.
lee.authenticity_notes: Union Made labels. Storm Rider jackets. Check label fonts and construction. USA made.

levis.notes: Est. 1853, USA. Big E red tab (pre-1971), USA-made most valuable.
levis.authenticity_notes: Big E on red tab (pre-1971). Redline selvedge visible on cuffs. Check back pocket stitching. USA made labels.

wrangler.notes: Est. 1947, USA. Rope label era, USA-made most valuable.
wrangler.authenticity_notes: USA made labels. Check W stitching on back pockets. Rope label era for vintage.

acne_studios.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and Swedish sizing. Made in Portugal/Italy.

aidan_mattox.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels for brand name and care instructions.

aquascutum.notes: Look for 'Made in England', royal warrant on tag. Vintage pre-2000 most valuable.
aquascutum.authenticity_notes: Made in England label. Royal warrant crest on label. Pre-2000 pieces have different label styles.

akris.authenticity_notes: Made in Switzerland. Check interior silk lining and quality of construction.

amiri.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware quality. Made in USA/Italy. Watch for fakes.

all_saints.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Leather jackets should have quality zippers.

alo_yoga.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and size tags.

aritzia.authenticity_notes: Check sub-brand labels (Wilfred, Babaton, TNA). Canadian brand.

brooks_brothers.authenticity_notes: Golden Fleece logo indicates mainline. Check label fonts. USA made for vintage.

claudie_pierlot.authenticity_notes: French brand. Check interior labels and construction quality.

coach.notes: 92 searches/minute on eBay 2025. #5 on TRR search. 2.1M eBay listings. 8 items listed per minute.
coach.authenticity_notes: Pre-2000 USA made = tier A. Vintage creed stamps have serial numbers. Check leather quality and stitching.

cos.authenticity_notes: H&M Group brand. Check interior labels.

danier.notes: Made in Canada pieces more valuable.
danier.authenticity_notes: Made in Canada label most valuable. Check leather quality.

dvf.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels. 1970s vintage has different label styles. Made in USA for vintage.

eileen_fisher.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and fabric content tags.

ellen_tracy.authenticity_notes: 1980s-90s pieces have different label styles. Check construction quality.

equipment.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and silk quality. Made in China for most pieces.

escada.authenticity_notes: Made in Germany most valuable. Margaretha Ley label (1978-1992) = highest value. Check label fonts and construction.

gloverall.authenticity_notes: UK made label. Wooden toggle closures. Check label fonts.

holt_renfrew.authenticity_notes: Canadian department store private label. Check label era and construction.

golden_goose.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check star logo and distressing quality. Watch for fakes on sneakers.

hugo_boss.authenticity_notes: Boss > Hugo > Orange > Green hierarchy. Check interior labels and construction.

isabel_marant.notes: Comeback Brand of the Year on TRR 2025.
isabel_marant.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Portugal. Etoile line = diffusion (lower value). Check label fonts.

j_crew.authenticity_notes: Collection line more valuable. Check interior labels.

jacquemus.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Italy. Check label fonts and hardware quality. Watch for fakes.

jonathan_simkhai.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and construction quality.

kate_spade.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Spade logo should be clean.

lululemon.authenticity_notes: Check size dot in pocket for style number. Logo should be crisp. Check seam quality.

lucian_matis.authenticity_notes: Made in Canada label. Canadian designer.

maje.authenticity_notes: French brand. Check interior labels and construction.

marc_aurel.authenticity_notes: German brand. Check interior labels and fabric quality.

max_mara.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Weekend = diffusion line (lower value). Check interior labels and construction.

nanette_lepore.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and construction quality.

rag_bone.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels. Made in USA for mainline denim.

ralph_lauren_polo.authenticity_notes: RRL and Polo Sport vintage = tier S value. Check polo player logo quality. Made in USA for vintage.

rhude.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and hardware. Watch for fakes.

sandro.authenticity_notes: French brand. Check interior labels and construction.

st_john.authenticity_notes: USA made more valuable. Check santana knit construction. Look for St. John logo buttons.

ted_baker.authenticity_notes: British brand. Check interior labels and hardware quality.

theory.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels and construction quality.

toteme.authenticity_notes: Swedish brand. Check interior labels and construction.

tory_burch.authenticity_notes: Check T logo quality and hardware. Interior labels should be clean.

vince.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels. Cashmere pieces should have quality handfeel.

anne_klein.notes: Watches resell around $20. Vintage 1970s-90s pieces have collector interest.
anne_klein.authenticity_notes: Vintage 1970s-90s pieces have different label styles. Check label fonts and construction.

anthropologie.authenticity_notes: Check sub-brand labels (Maeve, Pilcro, Moulinette Soeurs). Check interior tags.

bcbg.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels. BCBG Max Azria = mainline.

gap.authenticity_notes: 1990s vintage has different label styles. Made in USA for older pieces.

jones_new_york.authenticity_notes: 1980s-90s pieces have early rectangular border tags. Check label fonts.

loft.authenticity_notes: Ann Taylor diffusion line. Check interior labels.

massimo_dutti.authenticity_notes: Inditex Group brand. Check interior labels and construction quality.

uniqlo.authenticity_notes: +J and designer collabs have special labels. Check interior tags.

alexander_mcqueen.notes: Est. 1992, UK by Lee Alexander McQueen. McQueen era (pre-2010) most valuable; known for dramatic tailoring and skull motifs.
alexander_mcqueen.authenticity_notes: McQueen era (pre-2010) most valuable. Made in Italy. Check skull motifs and label quality. Heavy faking.

armani_mainline.notes: Est. 1975, Italy by Giorgio Armani. Known for deconstructed tailoring; Giorgio > Emporio > A|X value hierarchy.
armani_mainline.authenticity_notes: Giorgio > Emporio > A|X hierarchy. Check label fonts and Made in Italy. Giorgio Armani label = mainline.

balenciaga.notes: Est. 1919, Spain by Cristóbal Balenciaga. Known for architectural silhouettes; Nicolas Ghesquière era (1997-2012) highly collectible.
balenciaga.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check interior labels and hardware. Heavy faking - verify serial numbers on bags.

bottega_veneta.notes: Est. 1966, Italy. Known for intrecciato leather weave; Daniel Lee era (2018-2021) highly sought.
bottega_veneta.authenticity_notes: Intrecciato weave is signature. Made in Italy. Check leather quality and weave consistency.

burberry.notes: Est. 1856, UK by Thomas Burberry. Known for trench coats and nova check; Burberrys' (apostrophe) = pre-1999.
burberry.authenticity_notes: Burberrys' (apostrophe) = vintage pre-1999. Made in England most valuable. Check nova check alignment.

carolina_herrera.authenticity_notes: Check interior labels. Made in Italy/Spain for mainline.

celine.authenticity_notes: Phoebe Philo era (2008-2018) = CÉLINE with accent. Post-2018 = CELINE no accent. Made in Italy.

chanel.notes: #2 most searched on TRR. Highest product views per person on Vestiaire. Bags most searched item on TRR.
chanel.authenticity_notes: Check authenticity card and hologram. Chain weight should be heavy. Stitching count consistent. Made in France/Italy. Heavy faking.

chrome_hearts.notes: 36% growth on eBay 2025. Rising men's brand on Poshmark.
chrome_hearts.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. Sterling silver should be marked 925. Check dagger cross and floral motifs. Heavy faking.

christian_dior.authenticity_notes: Galliano era (1997-2011) most sought. Check Christian Dior PARIS label. Made in France/Italy. Licensed items less valuable.

comme_des_garcons.authenticity_notes: Play (heart logo) = diffusion line. Check label placement and fonts. Made in Japan for mainline.

dolce_gabbana.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check label fonts and construction. D&G = diffusion (lower value).

emilio_pucci.authenticity_notes: 1960s-70s prints most valuable. Check signature prints and Made in Italy label.

fear_of_god.authenticity_notes: Essentials = diffusion. Main line made in Italy/USA. Check label fonts and hardware. Heavy faking.

fendi.notes: Baguette bag among most coveted on eBay 2025.
fendi.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check FF logo consistency. Baguette bags have serial numbers. Check leather quality.

ferragamo.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Vara flats have distinctive bow. Check Gancini hardware quality.

givenchy.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy/France. Check 4G logo consistency. Vintage Givenchy labels differ from modern.

goyard.notes: Saint Louis tote +18% value 2025 on TRR. 47% sales growth on eBay.
goyard.authenticity_notes: No retail stores outside Paris. Hand-painted chevron pattern. Check Y pattern alignment. Very heavy faking.

gucci.notes: Led pre-loved sales on Vestiaire 2025. Jackie and Marmont bags top sellers.
gucci.authenticity_notes: Tom Ford era (1994-2004) most sought. Check GG alignment. Made in Italy. Serial numbers on bags. Heavy faking.

hermes.notes: Birkin 30 +15% value 2025. Kelly bags sell 50% above MSRP on TRR.
hermes.authenticity_notes: Check blind stamp for date. Made in France. Hand-saddle-stitched. Heavy faking - expert authentication recommended.

issey_miyake.authenticity_notes: Pleats Please line collectible. Made in Japan. Check pleat consistency and label fonts.

jean_paul_gaultier.authenticity_notes: 1990s mesh tops iconic. Made in France/Italy. Check label fonts and sailor stripe quality.

loewe.authenticity_notes: Made in Spain. Check anagram logo embossing quality. Puzzle bag stitching precise. Heavy faking on bags.

louis_vuitton.notes: #1 most searched on Poshmark, TRR, eBay. 2.6M+ listings on eBay. 13 items listed per minute.
louis_vuitton.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Spain/USA. Date codes required (format varies by era). Canvas alignment at seams. Most faked brand - expert auth recommended.

maison_margiela.notes: 22% price growth on eBay 2025. Top growth on Vestiaire. Climbed from 31st to 25th globally.
maison_margiela.authenticity_notes: Four white stitches at back. Blank label era (pre-2014) collectible. Made in Italy. Check stitch quality.

marc_jacobs.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy for mainline. Marc by Marc Jacobs is diffusion (lower value). Check label font and hardware quality.

missoni.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Signature zigzag knit patterns. Check knit quality and color registration. Family-owned.

miu_miu.notes: 31% price increase 2025. Market Mover of the Year on TRR. #4 most searched. 32% growth on eBay.
miu_miu.authenticity_notes: Prada sister brand. Made in Italy. Check hardware engravings. Serial numbers on bags. Moderate faking.

oscar_de_la_renta.authenticity_notes: Made in USA or Italy. Check label fonts and construction. Red carpet gowns most valuable.

prada.notes: #3 most searched on TRR. 11% resale value increase over 5 years.
prada.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Serial number cards on bags. 1990s nylon/Linea Rossa era collectible. Triangle logo precise. Heavy faking.

ralph_lauren_purple.authenticity_notes: Purple Label only - Made in Italy. Other RL lines (Polo, Lauren) are tier A/B. Check purple label tag.

roberto_cavalli.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Animal prints signature. Just Cavalli diffusion (lower value). Check label and hardware.

thierry_mugler.authenticity_notes: Made in France. 1980s-90s power suits extremely collectible. Sculptural shoulders. Check construction quality.

valentino.authenticity_notes: Valentino Garavani mainline (highest). Made in Italy. Red signature color. Check rockstud hardware quality on modern pieces.

versace.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Gianni era (pre-1997) most collectible. Medusa head precise. Versus diffusion lower value. Heavy faking.

the_row.notes: 27% value increase 2025. Fastest growing brand on TRR. Ranked #7 globally.
the_row.authenticity_notes: Made in USA/Italy. Minimal branding. Check fabric quality and construction. Limited faking currently.

vivienne_westwood.notes: 60% growth in 2024. Y2K revival brand. Big Gen Z demand.
vivienne_westwood.authenticity_notes: Made in UK/Italy. Orb logo. 1980s punk era most valuable. Check orb emblem precision. Moderate faking.

yohji_yamamoto.authenticity_notes: Made in Japan. Avant-garde black designs. Y's diffusion (lower value). Check label typography and construction.

yves_saint_laurent.authenticity_notes: Rive Gauche (vintage) vs Saint Laurent Paris (modern). Made in France/Italy. Le Smoking tuxedo iconic. Check YSL cassandre logo precision.

tier_S.description: Luxury designer — always purchase if reasonably priced

azzedine_alaia.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Italy. Body-con construction. Laser-cut leather signature. Check seam precision and stretch quality.

biba.authenticity_notes: 1960s-70s London boutique. Black and gold label. Art deco styling. Very rare - museum collectible.

cacharel.authenticity_notes: Made in France. 1970s-80s pieces most valuable. Liberty print collaborations collectible.

ceil_chapman.authenticity_notes: 1940s-60s cocktail dresses. NYC couturier. Check union labels and construction quality.

claude_montana.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Italy. 1980s power shoulders. Sculptural leather work. Check construction and label.

courreges.authenticity_notes: Made in France. 1960s-70s space age designs. White go-go boots iconic. Check logo precision.

gunne_sax.authenticity_notes: Made in USA (San Francisco). 1970s-80s prairie dresses. Jessica McClintock labels. Check lace and construction.

halston.authenticity_notes: Original 1970s Halston only - not licensed lines. Made in USA. Ultrasuede, jersey draping signature.

kenzo.notes: Est. 1970, France by Kenzo Takada. Takada era (1970s-90s) most collectible; bold florals and jungle prints.
kenzo.authenticity_notes: Kenzo Takada era (1970s-90s). Made in France. Bold florals and jungle prints. Check label styles.

krizia.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Animal motifs (especially panther). 1970s-90s pieces most valuable.

laura_ashley.notes: Est. 1953, UK. Made in Wales labels most valuable; 1970s-80s prairie florals.
laura_ashley.authenticity_notes: Made in UK/Wales labels most valuable. 1970s-80s prairie florals. Check country of origin.

lilli_ann.authenticity_notes: San Francisco label (1940s-70s). Suits and coats. Check union labels and French fabrics.

moschino.notes: Est. 1983, Italy by Franco Moschino. Franco era (1983-1994) most valuable; ironic/pop art designs.
moschino.authenticity_notes: Franco Moschino era (1980s-90s). Made in Italy. Ironic/pop art pieces most valuable. Check label and humor elements.

norma_kamali.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. 1980s sweatshirt gowns, sleeping bag coat iconic. OMO label. Check construction.

ossie_clark.authenticity_notes: Made in UK. Often with Celia Birtwell prints. 1960s-70s pieces museum-grade. Check Quorum or Radley labels.

patrick_kelly.authenticity_notes: 1980s Paris couture. Made in France. Black American designer - very rare. Button embellishments signature.

pauline_trigere.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. 1950s-80s. NYC couturier. Wool coats, bias-cut dresses. Check union labels.

pendleton.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. Wool shirts, blankets. Check for Portland OR label. Vintage wool shirts collectible.

pierre_cardin.notes: Est. 1950, France. Space age era (1960s-70s) valuable; avoid later licensed products.
pierre_cardin.authenticity_notes: Only 1960s-70s vintage valuable. Made in France. Space age designs. Avoid licensed products.

romeo_gigli.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. 1980s-90s romantic/orientalist designs. Soft shoulders, rich colors. Check label and draping.

stephen_sprouse.authenticity_notes: 1980s NYC designer. Neon colors, graffiti prints. LV collaboration 2001. Very collectible, limited production.

pricing_notes.brand_premium_multiplier: Multiply base resale by this factor for branded items

meta.purpose: Brand valuation guide for vintage clothing and shoes

alden.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. Shell cordovan leather highest value. Check for Horween shell stamps. Goodyear welt construction.

allen_edmonds.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. Goodyear welt. Check heel stamp for factory info. Port Washington, WI production.

chie_mihara.notes: Made in Spain. Retails $300-450, resale ~1/3 retail.
chie_mihara.authenticity_notes: Made in Spain. Check leather quality and sole construction. Spanish craftsmanship.

aquazzura.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check sole stamp and leather quality. Limited faking currently.

birkenstock.authenticity_notes: Made in Germany on footbed. Check cork quality and buckle engravings. Heavy faking.

churchs.authenticity_notes: Made in England (Northampton). Goodyear welt. Pre-Prada (pre-1999) most collectible.

cole_haan.authenticity_notes: Check country of origin - USA-made vintage more valuable. Now mostly imported.

crockett_jones.authenticity_notes: Made in England (Northampton). Hand-lasted. Check for factory stamps inside.

dr_martens.authenticity_notes: Made in England boots highest value. Check sole for 'Made in England'. Yellow stitching, air-cushioned sole.

florsheim.notes: Est. 1892, USA (Chicago). Imperial line, USA/Chicago-made most valuable.
florsheim.authenticity_notes: Imperial line, USA made most valuable. Check union labels on vintage. Look for Chicago IL tags.

fly_london.authenticity_notes: Made in Portugal. Check leather quality and sole construction. Portuguese manufacturing.

frye.authenticity_notes: Made in USA on vintage. Campus boot iconic. Check for Marlborough MA labels on older pairs.

gianvito_rossi.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check leather sole stamp and quality. Minimal faking.

grenson.authenticity_notes: Made in England (Rushden). Goodyear welt. Check factory stamps inside shoe.

john_fluevog.notes: Made in Portugal/Brazil/Peru. 'Resists Satan' sole inscription authenticates. Discontinued styles valuable.
john_fluevog.authenticity_notes: Made in Portugal/Brazil/Peru. 'Resists Alkali, Water, Acid, Fatigue, and Satan' sole. Vancouver brand.

loake.authenticity_notes: Made in England (Kettering). Goodyear welt on 1880 range. Check for English origin stamp.

miz_mooz.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy/Portugal. Check leather quality and sole construction.

on_running.authenticity_notes: Swiss brand. CloudTec sole technology. Check box labels and quality. Growing counterfeit market.

red_wing.authenticity_notes: Made in USA (Red Wing, MN). Check leather type and size tag for production info. Heritage line most valuable.

roots.notes: Made in Canada pieces most valuable. TUFF boots collectible.
roots.authenticity_notes: Made in Canada labels most valuable. Canadian brand. TUFF boots, Negative Heel collectible.

stuart_weitzman.authenticity_notes: Made in Spain. Check sole stamp. 5050 boot iconic. Minimal faking.

think.authenticity_notes: Made in Austria. Eco-friendly production. Check sole and insole for branding.

wolverine_1000_mile.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. Horween Chromexcel leather. Goodyear welt. Check for Big Rapids, MI tags.

bottega_veneta.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Intrecciato weave signature. Check weave precision. Heavy faking on bags and accessories.

chanel.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy/France. Serial numbers on ballet flats. CC logo precision. Very heavy faking - expert auth recommended.

christian_louboutin.authenticity_notes: Red lacquered sole signature. Made in Italy. Check sole color (specific red), logo stamp, serial numbers. Heavy faking.

ferragamo.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Vara bow iconic. Check metal hardware and leather quality. Serial numbers on newer styles.

gucci.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check GG alignment, hardware quality, serial numbers. Horsebit loafer iconic. Heavy faking.

jimmy_choo.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check sole stamp, leather quality, hardware. Moderate faking.

manolo_blahnik.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Cobalt blue sole interior. Check craftsmanship. BB pump iconic. Moderate faking.

prada.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Check triangle logo, hardware quality. Serial numbers on cards. Heavy faking.

roger_vivier.authenticity_notes: Made in France/Italy. Pilgrim buckle iconic. Check buckle quality and sole construction. Limited faking.

tods.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Gommino driving shoes signature. Check pebble sole and leather quality.

valentino.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. Rockstud hardware - check stud precision and placement. Moderate faking.

andrea_pfister.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy. 1970s-80s avant-garde designs. Hand-painted and sculptural. Check Italian labels.

andrew_geller.authenticity_notes: 1950s-60s American designer. Check NYC labels. Architectural heels collectible.

bally.authenticity_notes: Made in Switzerland (vintage). Check for Swiss origin on older pairs. Now made in Italy.

beth_levine.authenticity_notes: 1950s-70s NYC designer. Topless shoe, clear vinyl innovations. Herbert Levine label. Museum collectible.

bruno_magli.authenticity_notes: Made in Italy (Bologna). Check leather quality and Italian craftsmanship.

charles_jourdan.authenticity_notes: Made in France. 1970s-80s sculptural heels. Guy Bourdin ad campaigns era collectible.

david_evins.authenticity_notes: Made in USA. 'King of Pumps'. Designed for celebrities. Check union labels and construction.

delman.authenticity_notes: Made in USA vintage. NYC luxury shoemaker. Check union labels on older pairs.

herbert_levine.authenticity_notes: 1950s-70s NYC brand. Beth Levine designed. Innovative designs. Museum collectible.

i_miller.authenticity_notes: 1940s-70s NYC retailer. Check union labels. Andy Warhol illustrated their ads.

maud_frizon.authenticity_notes: Made in France. 1980s sculptural designs. Cone heels signature. Check French labels.
